Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.games

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.games.GameManager
public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
GameManager handle all different phases and states of the game, avoiding players to make illegal operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager​(int numPlayers, ControllerGame controllerGame)
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - is the number of players of the game
      controllerGame - is the controllerGame if @param numPlayers == 1 create a new SinglePlayerGame, otherwise create a new Game. Then set currentState first action.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentState

      public GameState getCurrentState()

    • setCurrentState

      public void setCurrentState​(GameState newState)

    • getNumOfPlayers

      public int getNumOfPlayers()

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer​(View view, java.lang.String nickName) throws AlreadyTakenNicknameException
      Parameters:
      view - is player's view.
      nickName - is player's nickname.
      Throws:
      AlreadyTakenNicknameException - if player has chosen an already taken nickname. tries tp create a new player if nickname has not chosen yet and then add his view to game observers.

    • deletePlayer

      public void deletePlayer​(java.lang.String nickName)

    • getPlayerPosition

      public java.lang.String getPlayerPosition​(int position)

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      if game has reached the correct num of players, send to everyone nickname of all players and 4 different leader cards.

    • leaderCardHandler

      public void leaderCardHandler​(int player, int card1, int card2, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards) throws IllegalStateException
      Parameters:
      player - is one player.
      card1 - is one LeaderCard.
      card2 - is one LeaderCard.
      leaderCards - is the list of leader cards from which player could choose.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if player has already chosen his leader cards or game already started. if player has not already chosen his leader cards, add to his playerboard. If all players have made their choices, start the game.

    • oneResourceHandle

      public void oneResourceHandle​(int player, Resource resource) throws IllegalStateException
      Parameters:
      player - is one player.
      resource - is player's first chosen resource.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if player has already chosen his first resource or game already started. if player has not already chosen his resource, add to his warehouse. If all players have made their choices, start the game.

    • twoResourceHandle

      public void twoResourceHandle​(int player, Resource r1, Resource r2) throws IllegalStateException
      Parameters:
      player - is one player.
      r1 - is player's first chosen resource.
      r2 - is player's second chosen resource.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if player has already chosen his first resource or game already started. if player has not already chosen his resources, add to his warehouse. If all players have made their choices, start the game.

    • buyCardHandler

      public boolean buyCardHandler​(int row, int column, int choice) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException, ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException, InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      row - is DevelopmentCard deck's row
      column - is DevelopmentCard deck's column.
      choice - refers to which between strongbox and warehouse has the priority to be decreased.
      Returns:
      true if card has been bought, instead @return false if there are two or three available slots.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters.
      EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException - if player has chosen an empty deck.
      ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException - if player has not available slots to insert card.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources. if there are two or three available slots to buy the card, change currentState to BUY_CARD_STATE and save all data about player's row and column choices.

    • chosenSlotHandler

      public void chosenSlotHandler​(int slot) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException, ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException, InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      slot - is player's chosen slot.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters.
      EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException - if player has chosen an empty deck.
      ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException - if player has not available slots to insert card.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources. if player has enough resources set currentState to END_TURN_STATE, otherwise return to FIRST_ACTION_STATE.

    • takeMarbleHandler

      public Marble[] takeMarbleHandler​(int choice, int index) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      choice - == 0 if player has chosen a market row, or @param choice == 1 if player has chosen market column.
      index - is player's chosen row or column.
      Returns:
      the chosen marbles.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters. set currentState to TAKE_MARBLE_STATE and save data about chosen marbles.

    • useMarbleHandler

      public boolean useMarbleHandler​(Marble chosenMarble) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      chosenMarble - is player's chosen marble.
      Returns:
      false if player has chosen a white marble and it own two active WhiteConversionCard, otherwise @return true.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters. if player has chosen a white marble and player has two active WhiteConversionCard, setCurrentState to WHITE_CONVERSION_STATE and save data about chosen marbles. in any other cases, use marble, remove from chosen marbles and in case it was the last marble, set currenStae to END_TURN_STATE.

    • whiteConversionCardHandler

      public void whiteConversionCardHandler​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is player's chosen LeaderCard (1 or 2).
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters. if there weren't any remaining marble set currentState to END_TURN_STATE, otherwise return to TAKE_MARBLE_STATE.

    • switchHandler

      public void switchHandler​(int depot1, int depot2) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, ImpossibleSwitchDepotException
      Parameters:
      depot1 - is player's first chosen depot.
      depot2 - is player's second chosen depot.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters.
      ImpossibleSwitchDepotException - if player can't switch the chosen depots.

    • developmentCardPowerHandler

      public void developmentCardPowerHandler​(int chosenSlot, int choice) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, InsufficientResourceException, NoSuchProductionPowerException, AlreadyUsedProductionPowerException
      Parameters:
      chosenSlot - is player's chosen card to activate production power.
      choice - refers to which between strongbox and warehouse has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player hos not enough resources.
      NoSuchProductionPowerException - if player has chosen an empty SlotDevelopmentCard.
      AlreadyUsedProductionPowerException - if player has already chosen this power production. if currentState is FIRST_ACTION_STATE create a new Strongbox otherwise get the saved one. Then decrease player resources by the amount required and increase this Strongbox with the amount given and then saved Strongbox. also set currentState to ACTIVATE_PRODUCTION_STATE.

    • basicPowerHandler

      public void basicPowerHandler​(Resource r1, Resource r2, Resource r3, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException, IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, AlreadyUsedProductionPowerException
      Parameters:
      r1 - is player's chosen resource to be decreased.
      r2 - is player's chosen resource to be decreased.
      r3 - is player's chosen resource to be increased.
      choice - refers to which between strongbox and warehouse has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player hos not enough resources.
      AlreadyUsedProductionPowerException - if player has already chosen this power production. if currentState is FIRST_ACTION_STATE create a new Strongbox otherwise get the saved one. Then decrease player resources by the amount required and increase this Strongbox with the amount given and then saved Strongbox. also set currentState to ACTIVATE_PRODUCTION_STATE.

    • leaderCardPowerHandler

      public void leaderCardPowerHandler​(int chosenLeaderCard, Resource r, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException, IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, NoSuchProductionPowerException, AlreadyUsedProductionPowerException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is player's chosen LeaderCard (1 or 2)
      r - is player's chosen resource to be added.
      choice - refers to which between strongbox and warehouse has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player hos not enough resources.
      NoSuchProductionPowerException - if player has chosen an empty SlotDevelopmentCard.
      AlreadyUsedProductionPowerException - if player has already chosen this power production. if currentState is FIRST_ACTION_STATE create a new Strongbox otherwise get the saved one. Then decrease player resources by the amount required and increase this Strongbox with the amount given and then saved Strongbox. also set currentState to ACTIVATE_PRODUCTION_STATE.

    • endProductionHandler

      public void endProductionHandler() throws IllegalStateException
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state. set currentState to END_TURN_STATE.

    • leaderActivationHandler

      public void leaderActivationHandler​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws InsufficientResourceException, AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException, ActiveLeaderCardException, InsufficientCardsException, IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is player's chosen LeaderCard.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if player has not enough DevelopmentCards.
      ActiveLeaderCardException - if player has already activated this LeaderCard previously.
      InsufficientCardsException - if player has already discarded this LeaderCard previously.
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters.

    • leaderDiscardHandler

      public void leaderDiscardHandler​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws ActiveLeaderCardException, AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException, IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is player's chosen LeaderCard.
      Throws:
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if player has not enough DevelopmentCards.
      ActiveLeaderCardException - if player has already activated this LeaderCard previously.
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.
      WrongParametersException - if player has sent wrong parameters.

    • endTurnHandler

      public void endTurnHandler() throws IllegalStateException
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if it's not the right turn state.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
